name: HARDLINE GUNNER alpha demo
description:
>>> UPDATE <<<

THE NEW ALPAH DEMO Ver 021-Feb-2015 IS FINALLY HERE!

THE GAME

Hardline Gunner is a challenging bullet-hell top-down arcade shooter. It has fast paced gameplay, unique challenges with every level, and a wonderful minimalistic visual style.

Shoot, dodge and deflect enemy fire to survive the difficult road to the boss and test your skill through 9 new levels in this free alpha demo.


ALPHA DEMO

Hardline Gunner is in early alpha. Designs are still changing and features are still being implemented to make this game the best it can be. Your feedback is always welcome and a value to us as we continue development. Send us an email or contact us on Twitter. We'd love to hear from you.

PLATFORMS
  • Windows x64
  • Windows x32
  • Mac x64
  • Linux *requires java installed
CONTACTS

This game is being developed by LAZORUN GAMES:

  • Orun Irunmale @Orunbot
  • Matt Lazaridis @LazAtLazorun
